resources.string: The best movie streaming app of the century to make your days great!
Choose your interests and get the best movie recommendations. Don\'t worry, you can always change it later.
Please select at least 3 interests about movies
Please select at least 3 interests about series
It\'s illegal, we can\'t stream the movie without the distribution rights
Are you sure you want to watch the film illegally?
Are you sure you want to log out?
Are you sure you want to delete your history? This action is irreversible.
" It seems that you haven't added any movies to the list"

This Privacy Policy explains how FlixHub collects, uses and protects the personal information you provide to us when you use our FlixHub mobile application (the \"Application\"). FlixHub is dedicated to protecting the privacy of its users. Any information we collect is used in accordance with this privacy policy. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to the terms of this privacy policy, please do not use the application.

1.1 Personal information: When you use the application, we may collect certain personal information about you, such as your name, e-mail address, age, and content preferences. 1.2 Usage data: We may also collect information about how you use the application, such as movies/shows watched, searches performed, interactions with the user interface, etc.

We use the information we collect to: - Provide you with personalized features and services. - Improve and optimize the user experience. - Analyze usage trends and user preferences. - Send you notifications and updates about the application.

We do not sell, trade or rent your personal information to third parties without your consent. However, we may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating the application or providing services on our behalf, subject to this privacy policy.
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.
FlixHub reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes to this Privacy Policy will be posted on this page with the updated revision date.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at nassimlnd37@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy was last updated on March 27, 2024.
